example.name: intraperitoneal-j, ARG1
example.text: Further intraperitoneal organs are the liver , the stomach and the spleen .

example.name: intraperitoneal-01, as manner
example.text: It is suggested that patients with peritoneal metastases may benefit from the addition of intraperitoneal chemotherapy to systemic chemotherapy .
